scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node -r dotenv/config node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --reporters=default --reporters=./config/simpleJestReporter.js dotenv_config_path=.env.test
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node -r dotenv/config node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --coverage dotenv_config_path=.env.test
scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node -r dotenv/config node_modules/.bin/jest --watch dotenv_config_path=.env.test
scripts.test:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node -r dotenv/config npx sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node -r dotenv/config npx sequelize-cli db:migrate dotenv_config_path=.env.test
